means.word_mean: 在任何时候; 在某时; 有时; 从来

sentences.en: Have you ever been there?
sentences.cn: 你曾去过那里吗?

sentences.en: Don't you ever think about your work?
sentences.cn: 难道你就不考虑一下自己的工作吗?

sentences.en: I hardly ever go to bed after midnight.
sentences.cn: 我几乎从来不会在午夜以后去睡觉的。

sentences.en: If you are ever in Spain, come and see me.
sentences.cn: 你要是到西班牙来, 请一定来找我。

sentences.en: Their products enjoy ever higher prestige in the world market.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品在世界市场上享有越来越高的声誉。

sentences.en: This is the best work you have ever done.
sentences.cn: 这是你所做的最好的工作。

sentences.en: They were very happy ever afterwards.
sentences.cn: 以后他们一直幸福地生活着。

sentences.en: The world's ever-increasing population will cause great problems in the future.
sentences.cn: 世界人口的不断增长将给未来带来重大的问题。

sentences.en: How ever did I forget it?
sentences.cn: 我怎么竟然把它忘了呢?

sentences.en: When ever did you lose it?
sentences.cn: 你究竟在什么时候把它弄丢的?</seg>

mean.mean: （用于否定句和疑问句，或与if连用的句子）在任何时候，从来

lj.lj_ly: ever and anon the stillness is rent by the scream of a gibbon.

lj.lj_ly: she had lived alone ever since her husband died.

jx.jx_en_mean: (亦作 ever yours)a formula used to end an informal letter, before the signature
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［非正式信件中，信末署名前使用的套语］您永远的

phrase.cizu_name: ever and again 或 ever and anon

entry.def: Ever means at any time. It is used in questions and negative statements.
entry.tran: （用于否定句和疑问句）在任何时候，从来

example.ex: I'm not sure I'll ever trust people again...
example.tran: 我不确定自己是否还会再相信任何人。

example.ex: Neither of us had ever skied...
example.tran: 我们两个都从未滑过雪。

entry.def: You use ever in expressions such as 'did you ever' and 'have you ever' to express surprise or shock at something you have just seen, heard, or experienced, especially when you expect people to agree with you.
entry.tran: （表示惊讶、震惊，尤用于希望别人赞同时）曾否，可曾

example.ex: Have you ever seen anything like it?...
example.tran: 你可曾见过像它这样的东西？

example.ex: Did you ever hear anyone sound so peculiar?
example.tran: 你可曾听过谁的声音如此奇特？

entry.def: You use ever after comparatives and superlatives to emphasize the degree to which something is true or when you are comparing a present situation with the past or the future.
entry.tran: （用于比较级和最高级后表示强调）以往任何时候，曾经

example.ex: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever...
example.tran: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。

example.ex: Japan is wealthier and more powerful than ever before...
example.tran: 日本比以往任何时候都更加富有和强大。

entry.def: You use ever to indicate that a person is showing a particular quality that is typical of them.

example.ex: He was ever careful to check his scripts...
example.tran: 他一向都认真检查剧本。

example.ex: Mother, ever the peacemaker, pointed her finger at my little brother and said, 'See? Now stop!'
example.tran: 一向充当和事佬的妈妈用手指着弟弟说：“看到了没？快住手！”

entry.def: You use ever to say that something happens more all the time.

example.ex: They grew ever further apart...
example.tran: 他们变得越来越疏远了。

example.ex: I think the amount of work will increase and that it will become ever more complex.
example.tran: 我想工作会越来越多，而且更加复杂。

entry.def: You can use ever for emphasis after 'never'.

example.ex: I can never, ever, forgive myself...
example.tran: 我永远无法原谅我自己。

example.ex: Felix has never, ever confided in me.
example.tran: 费利克斯从来都未向我倾诉过。

entry.def: You use ever in questions beginning with words such as 'why', 'when', and 'who' when you want to emphasize your surprise or shock.
entry.tran: （用于以why，when，who等开头的疑问句中表示强调）究竟，到底

example.ex: Why ever didn't you tell me?...
example.tran: 你究竟为什么不告诉我？

example.ex: When ever am I going to see you again?...
example.tran: 我到底什么时候再见到你？

entry.def: If something has been the case ever since a particular time, it has been the case all the time from then until now.

example.ex: He's been there ever since you left!...
example.tran: 自从你离开后他就一直在那里！

example.ex: Ever since we moved last year, I worry a lot about whether I can handle this new job...
example.tran: 自从去年我们搬家，我就一直非常担心能否做好这份新工作。

entry.def: You use ever in the expressions ever such and ever so to emphasize that someone or something has a particular quality, especially when you are expressing enthusiasm or gratitude.
entry.tran: （尤用于表示非常感兴趣或感激时）非常，太

example.ex: When I met Derek he was ever such a good dancer...
example.tran: 我认识德里克时，他是个非常出色的舞者。

example.ex: This is in ever such good condition...
example.tran: 它保存得非常好。

entry.def: You use the expression all someone ever does when you want to emphasize that they do the same thing all the time, and this annoys you.

example.ex: All she ever does is whinge and complain...
example.tran: 她就会发牢骚抱怨。

example.ex: All he ever does is discuss the same boring list of medications.
example.tran: 他就会翻来覆去讨论同一个无聊的药品单。

entry.def: You say as ever in order to indicate that something or someone's behaviour is not unusual because it is like that all the time or very often.

example.ex: As ever, the meals are primarily fish-based...
example.tran: 像往常一样，饭菜主要是鱼。

example.ex: He was by himself, alone, as ever.
example.tran: 他独自一人，一如往常。

entry.def: You can write 'Yours ever' or 'Ever yours' at the end of a letter before you sign your name, as an affectionate way of ending the letter.
entry.tran: （用于书信结尾署名之前）你永远的朋友

sentences.sentence: "the best con man of all time"

means.word_mean: 2. at all times; all the time and on every occasion;

sentences.sentence: "I will always be there to help you"
"there is always some pollution in the air"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ǣfre, of unknown origin

sentences.cn: 这儿从未发生过任何事。
sentences.en: Nothing ever happens here.

sentences.cn: 难道你从来不累吗？

sentences.cn: 你要是什么时候到了迈阿密，就来看看我们吧。
sentences.en: If you're ever in Miami, come and see us.

sentences.cn: “你想过换一下工作吗？”“没有，从未想过。”
sentences.en: ‘Have you ever thought of changing your job? ’ ‘No, never/No I haven't. ’

sentences.en: ‘Have you ever been to Rome? ’ ‘Yes, I have, actually. Not long ago. ’

sentences.en: She hardly ever (= almost never) goes out.

sentences.cn: 我们难得见到他们。
sentences.en: We see them very seldom, if ever .

sentences.cn: 我再也不会干那种事了！
sentences.en: (informal)I'll never ever do that again!

sentences.cn: 像往常一样，饭菜主要是鱼。

sentences.cn: 他独自一人，一如往常。
sentences.en: He was by himself, alone, as ever.

sentences.en: He's been there ever since you left!...

sentences.cn: 日本比以往任何时候都更加富有和强大。
sentences.en: Japan is wealthier and more powerful than ever before...

sentences.cn: 他一向都认真检查剧本。
sentences.en: He was ever careful to check his scripts...

sentences.cn: 一向充当和事佬的妈妈用手指着弟弟说：“看到了没？快住手！”
sentences.en: Mother, ever the peacemaker, pointed her finger at my little brother and said, 'See? Now stop!'

sentences.cn: 我不确定自己是否还会再相信任何人。
sentences.en: I'm not sure I'll ever trust people again...

sentences.cn: 我们两个都从未滑过雪。
sentences.en: Neither of us had ever skied...

sentences.cn: 你可曾见过像它这样的东西？
sentences.en: Have you ever seen anything like it?...

sentences.cn: 你可曾听过谁的声音如此奇特？
sentences.en: Did you ever hear anyone sound so peculiar?

sentences.cn: 她的嗓音非常好，现在的唱功比以往任何时候都要好。
sentences.en: She's got a great voice and is singing better than ever...

sentences.cn: 保罗这个永远的乐观主义者答应再试一次。
sentences.en: Paul, ever the optimist, agreed to try again.

sentences.cn: 他说会永远爱她。
sentences.en: He said he would love her for ever (and ever) .

sentences.cn: 我永远无法原谅我自己。
sentences.en: I can never, ever, forgive myself...

sentences.cn: 我得提醒你,门不会永远都敞开着.
sentences.en: I should remind you that it won't stay open for ever.

sentences.cn: [新译]以色列啊!你要仰望耶和华,从现在直到永远.
sentences.en: KJV Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.

sentences.cn: 因为国度,权柄,荣耀,全是你的,直到永远,阿们. (有古卷无因为至阿们等字)
sentences.en: For thine is the kingdom and the power and the glory for ever . Amen.

sentences.cn: 唯一能够永远毁勃起对我来说是压力.
sentences.en: The only thing that's ever ruined an erection for me is stress.

sentences.cn: 而对于迈克, 我失去了我曾拥有的最好的朋友, 而且我永远地失去了.
sentences.en: With Mike, I lost the best friend I ever had, and I lost that forever.

sentences.cn: 他赐粮食给凡有血气的,因他的慈爱永远长存.
sentences.en: Who gives food to all flesh: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

sentences.cn: 我们家都永远不会忘记我们在上海相遇的日子.
sentences.en: None of us will ever forget the day when we meet in shanghai.

sentences.cn: 这是以色列人永远的定例.
sentences.en: This is an ordinance for ever to Israel.

sentences.cn: 巴黎公社将永远作为新社会的光辉先驱受人歌颂.
sentences.en: The Paris Commune will be for ever celebrated as the glorious harbinger of a new society.

sentences.cn: 我以为她那些空想的计划永远不会实现.
sentences.en: I don't think her idealistic plans will ever materialise.

sentences.cn: 第五种类型放置在寺庙的檐口上, 作为龙永远警觉危险那样.
sentences.en: A fifth is placed on the eaves of temples, as dragons are ever alert to danger.

sentences.cn: 虽然我们住得很远, 但是我们的心永远在一起!
sentences.en: We may live along way from one another, but our hearts are as close as ever.

sentences.cn: 称谢那独行大 奇事 的,因他的慈爱永远长存.
sentences.en: To him who only does great wonders : for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

sentences.cn: 难道他们永远都不会满足的 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do they ever become satisfied?

sentences.cn: 美好的东西永远不会消逝的.
sentences.en: And no good thing ever dies.

sentences.cn: 愿权能归给他、直到永永远远. 阿们.
sentences.en: To him power for ever and ever. Amen.

sentences.cn: 39我必因所罗门所行的使大卫后裔受患难, 但不至于永远.
sentences.en: And I will for this afflict the seed of David, but not for ever.

sentences.cn: 8我们终日因神夸耀, 还要永远称谢你的名. (细拉)
sentences.en: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever. Selah.

sentences.cn: 我要建立你的后裔,直到永远, 要建立你的宝座,直到万代.
sentences.en: Thy seed will I establish for ever, and build up thy throne to all generations. Selah.

sentences.cn: 你可以私自修改和使用它们, 永远都不发布它们.
sentences.en: You are free to make modifications and use them privately , without ever releasing them.

sentences.cn: 赫拉克里塔斯在他的隐语之一中说得很好, “干光永远最佳”.
sentences.en: Heraclitus saith well in one of his enigmas, Dry light is ever the best.

sentences.cn: 当然,菲德尔是永远的老大.
sentences.en: It was Fidel the mentor, as ever.

sentences.cn: 爱你们是为真理的缘故, 这真理存在我们里面,也必永远与我们同在.
sentences.en: For the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us and shall be with us for ever.

sentences.cn: 就是赐他的仆人以色列为业,因他的慈爱永远长存.
sentences.en: Even a heritage for his servant Israel: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

sentences.cn: 我将真心永远爱她.
sentences.en: I shall love her life and soul for ever.

sentences.cn: 永远不要在餐馆关门前15分钟进门用餐.
sentences.en: Never, ever come in 15 minutes before closing time.

sentences.cn: 一次成无赖, 永远是无赖.
sentences.en: Once a knave, ever a knave.

sentences.cn: 曾经的曾经, 是遥远的历史,也是永恒的纪念.
sentences.en: Ever of ever, a faraway history and also is eternal memorial.

sentences.cn: 有没有曾经到过长城?
sentences.en: Ever been to the Great Wall?

sentences.cn: 您曾经去过卡拉OK酒吧 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever been to a Karaoke bar?

sentences.cn: 想起自己曾经那样沉溺地需要一个人,我们毕竟有点惭愧.
sentences.en: Remember we ever are so enslaved to the other we are a little shamed after all.

sentences.cn: 你曾经高烧到多少度?
sentences.en: What's the highest temperature you've ever had?

sentences.cn: 你曾经去看过针灸医生 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever been to an acupuncturist?

sentences.cn: 你曾经去过夏威夷 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever been to Hawaii?

sentences.cn: 蒋先生及其党人曾经对这话提出过任何驳斥 吗 ?
sentences.en: Has Mr. Chiang or any member of his party ever rebutted this?

sentences.cn: 即使在她心中曾经潜藏着什么对他的反感的话, 这时也都消失了.
sentences.en: If there ever had lurked any feeling in her heart against him, it deserted her now.

sentences.cn: 曾经靠赌博作弊为生 么 ?
sentences.en: Ever live by cheating at play?

sentences.cn: 有人曾经说过: 眼睛是灵魂的窗户.
sentences.en: Someone ever said: The eye is the window to your soul.

sentences.cn: 曾经, 梦了, 爱了, 痛了, 醒了.
sentences.en: Ever, Dream, love, pain, awake.

sentences.cn: 您曾经晕过飞机 吗 ?您可能是晕机.
sentences.en: Have you ever suffered from airsickness before? You're probably airsick.

sentences.cn: 曾经住在永恒时间的神秘里的孩子.
sentences.en: The child ever dwells in the mystery of ageless time.

sentences.cn: 我已经离开学校很久了,甚至有些不记得自己曾经上过学了.
sentences.en: I've been out of school so long I hardly remember ever going.

sentences.cn: 你曾经喂过残疾儿童 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever fed the disabled children?

sentences.cn: 您曾经损害过他 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever done him an injury?

sentences.cn: 他曾经救过她的命.
sentences.en: He saved her life ever.

sentences.cn: 你曾经遇到过真正糟糕的暴风雪 吗 ?比如说暴风雪?
sentences.en: Have you ever run into a really bad snow storm? Like a blizzard?

sentences.cn: insuranceprofession?你曾经想过从事保险这一行业吗?
sentences.en: Have you ever thought about a career in the.

sentences.cn: 这是我曾经读到过的最有趣的一本书.
sentences.en: This is the most interesting book ( that ) I have ever read.

sentences.cn: 你曾经发过火 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you ever lose your temper?

sentences.cn: 精致的图形和栩栩如生的动画使这个唯一的保龄球游戏你曾经需要.
sentences.en: Stunning graphics and lifelike animations make this the only bowling game you'll ever need.

sentences.cn: 你曾经想过你为什么打哈欠 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you ever wonder why you yawn?

sentences.cn: 中国曾经是一个单纯的珠宝首饰饰品加工制造加工基地.
sentences.en: China has ever been a simplex jewelry manufactory.

sentences.cn: 这是我曾经看过的最精彩的电影之一.
sentences.en: This is one of the most wonderful films I have ever seen.

sentences.cn: 亲爱的, 我们曾经真的爱过!
sentences.en: Dear, we've ever been in true love!

sentences.cn: 你曾经过于自信 吗 ?
sentences.en: Could you ever have too much self ? confidence?

sentences.cn: 捷西卡: 你有曾经是输家的时候 吗 ?
sentences.en: Jessie : Have you ever been a loser?

sentences.cn: 你是否曾经为了销售额而让自己的设计妥协?
sentences.en: Have you ever had to forfeit any of your design ideals to stay in business?

sentences.cn: 在这以前,没有任何一个劳工代表参加过一家美国的大公司的董事会.
sentences.en: No representative of labor had ever sat on the board of a major American corporation.

sentences.cn: 你究竟为什么要同意？
sentences.en: Why ever did you agree?

sentences.cn: 你究竟为什么不告诉我？
sentences.en: Why ever didn't you tell me?...

sentences.cn: 他究竟往哪条路去的?
sentences.en: Which ever way did he go?

sentences.cn: 你究竟什么时候丢失这个东西的?
sentences.en: When ever did you drop it?

sentences.cn: 你究竟走那一条路?
sentences.en: Which ever way did you go?

sentences.cn: 你究竟为啥不打一个电话来 呢 ?
sentences.en: Why ever didn't you telephone?

sentences.cn: 你究竟有没有时间休息 呢 ?
sentences.en: Do you ever have time to relax?

sentences.cn: 宇宙容忍这种几近残酷的进化积蓄更为强大的进化性,究竟得到了 什么 ?
sentences.en: What does the universe gain by tolerating this relentless evolution accumulating ever more evolvability?

sentences.cn: 学者们争论究竟是否真的有过罗宾逊和亚瑟王.
sentences.en: Scholars debate whether Robin Hood or King Arthur ever really existed.

sentences.cn: 尼姆思忖着, 孩子们心里在想些什么,做父母的究竟了解多少呢?
sentences.en: What parent, Nim reflected, ever knew what went on in children's minds.

sentences.cn: 你究竟为什么用开水洗它?
sentences.en: Why ever did you wash it in boiling water?

sentences.cn: 你究竟在哪儿待了这么长时间?
sentences.en: Where ever have you been so long?

sentences.cn: 伯恩:我怀疑按这个价格我们还究竟能不能获得利润.
sentences.en: I doubt if we can ever make any profit at this price.

sentences.cn: 你究竟为什麽不这样说 呢 ?
sentences.en: Why ever did you not say so?

sentences.cn: 究竟是谁叫你求我借给你钱?
sentences.en: Who ever told you to ask me to lend you the money?

sentences.cn: 究竟出什么事了?
sentences.en: What ever is the matter?

sentences.cn: 这个词究竟指的是什么意思?
sentences.en: What ever is by this word?

sentences.cn: 我究竟怎样才处理得了这么多的工作?
sentences.en: How will I ever get on top of all this work?

sentences.cn: 今天早晨你究竟在忙什么?
sentences.en: What ever are you occupied with this morning?

sentences.cn: 你究竟在什么时候把它弄丢的?
sentences.en: When ever did you lose it?

sentences.cn: 当你听说绑架事件时, 你会想: ‘我当初究竟为什么要回来? ’
sentences.en: When you hear about kidnappings, you think:'Why did I ever come back?

sentences.cn: 关系日益紧密的政治联盟描述的,究竟是一个联邦国家还是一个超级国家?
sentences.en: Was ever closer political union a way of describing a federal or super state?

sentences.cn: 我想知道我究竟能否与自己和平相处.
sentences.en: I wonder if I can ever be at peace with myself.

sentences.cn: 他究竟怎样没受伤害就逃跑了?
sentences.en: How ever did he manage to escape unhurt?

sentences.cn: 你究竟怎样在这么短时间内轻那么多?
sentences.en: How ever did you lose so much in such a short time?

sentences.cn: 她究竟在做什 麽 ?
sentences.en: What ever is she doing?

sentences.cn: 他们究竟会不会成为未来的奥运冠军, 只有让时间来作出回答.
sentences.en: Whether they will ever become future Olympic champions, only time will tell.

sentences.cn: 至于这样一种建议办法究竟是否达到行动的程度,则不得而知了.
sentences.en: Whether such an arrangement was ever within the bounds of action cannot be known.

sentences.cn: 你究竟为什么不那样讲?
sentences.en: Why ever didn't you say so?

sentences.cn: 啊呀, 这个家伙几时喝醉了! 他究竟喝了多少酒,怎么会醉成这样子?
sentences.en: Man , is that guy ever grape shot! How can he hold enough to get that way?

sentences.cn: 我到底什么时候再见到你？
sentences.en: When ever am I going to see you again?...

sentences.cn: 你到底何时 [ 何地, 怎样 ] 丢失了这个东西?
sentences.en: When [ Where , How ] ever did you lose it?

sentences.cn: 他到底是成长得太顺利啦, 他恐怕还没有机会咀嚼过生活.
sentences.en: He really has grown up too easily, hasn't ever had the opportunity to truly taste life.

sentences.cn: 土耳其到底能够加入 吗 ?
sentences.en: Will Turkey ever join the union?

sentences.cn: 四个月前,经济博客上的问题是:德国经济到底会不会增长.
sentences.en: Four months ago the question on economics blogs was whether Germany was ever to grow.

sentences.cn: 尽管十分困难,我们还是要把这项工作进行到底.
sentences.en: We shall carry the work through to the end , be it ever so difficult.

sentences.cn: 到底发生了什麽事?
sentences.en: What ever hell , the devil has happened?

sentences.cn: 死者到底能否复生?
sentences.en: Do the dead ever come back to life?

sentences.cn: 你到底见过他没有?
sentences.en: And didst thou ever meet him?

sentences.cn: 你会告诉我到底发生了什么 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are you ever gonna tell me what's going on here?

sentences.cn: 他们到底是怎么处理的?
sentences.en: How did they ever manage?

sentences.cn: 简直是一场灾难! 我们落后太远了, 我怀疑我们到底能不能完成.
sentences.en: B : It's a disaster! We are so far behind, doubt we'll ever finish!

sentences.cn: 那小孩到底在哭什么? 他还在为失去的狗而伤心 吗 ?
sentences.en: What ever is that child weeping about now? Is he still weeping over his lost dog?

sentences.cn: 那名正式的钢琴师到底能不能赶上音乐会 呢 ?
sentences.en: Does the regular piano player ever make it to the concert?

sentences.cn: 你到底发现是谁干的了 吗 ?
sentences.en: Did you ever discover who did it?

sentences.cn: 就算是我兄弟凸槌我也要力挺到底.
sentences.en: If some shit ever does pop off, I'm supposed to be beside'em.

sentences.cn: 简直是一场灾难! 我们落后太远了. 我怀疑我们到底能不能完成.
sentences.en: It's a disaster! We are so far behind. I doubt we'll ever finish!

sentences.cn: 所有人都想知道的是: 这个人在政府里到底做了 什么 ?
sentences.en: All people want to know is: What has this man ever actually accomplished in government?

sentences.cn: 他到底是怎样卷入到这件丑闻中去的?
sentences.en: How in the world did he ever get mixed up in this scandalous affair?

sentences.cn: 有的时候我会想他到底能不能找到工作.
sentences.en: At times I wonder whether he'll ever get a job.

sentences.cn: 他们用来作为会晤场所的那座房子到底怎么样 啦 ?
sentences.en: What ever became of that house they used as a meeting place?

sentences.cn: 那到底是什么人?
sentences.en: Who ever can it be?

sentences.cn: 到底是什么使你想出那个主意的?
sentences.en: What ever put that idea in your head?

sentences.cn: 我从未见过有人进去买东西。到底有没有人进去过，我不知道。
sentences.en: I never saw anyone go in to buy. Whether they ever did I don't know.

sentences.cn: 我到底什么时候再见到你？
sentences.en: When ever am I going to see you again?

sentences.cn: 我的意思是，天啊，他一生中到底做过什么呀？
sentences.en: I mean, what's he ever done in his life, for crying out loud?

sentences.cn: 她到底还会不会讲到重点？
sentences.en: Was she ever going to get to the point?

sentences.cn: 你到底有没有想过可能会和她一见面就上床？
sentences.en: Did the thought that you might just possibly cop off with her ever cross your mind?

sentences.cn: 但是，美国是个特例：(28) 从全球范围看，11 月是至今为止最温暖的11 月，而且当前的数据表明，2013 年有可能是有记录以来气温第四高的一年。
sentences.en: But the U.S. was the exception: November was the warmest ever 28 globally, and current data indicates that 2013 is likely to have been the fourth hottest year on record.
